channel.title: default Installation directory whonix?
channel.description:
Hi,But I can't seem to find the standard installation directory within whonix, I've installed with sudo apt-get .. install a [python](https://mindmajix.com/python) program which installed "name.py" in "/path/tofile"
And I'd really like to execute the file, but I can't find it anywhere, Not in dolphin manually, not by searching in dolphin not by entering the filename in the specified search protocol of whoninx with settings to search in:
_"file///"_ _"/"_ _"/home"_ _"/bin"_ _"/usr"_
Could anyone tell me where the default installation folder is located within whonix?
Thanks, sandeep

item.title: default Installation directory whonix?
item.dc:creator: sandeepkumar
item.description:
Hi,But I can’t seem to find the standard installation directory within whonix, I’ve installed with sudo apt-get … install a python program which installed “name.py” in “/path/tofile”

And I’d really like to execute the file, but I can’t find it anywhere, Not in dolphin manually, not by searching in dolphin not by entering the filename in the specified search protocol of whoninx with settings to search in:

“file///”
“/”
“/home”
“/bin”
“/usr”

Could anyone tell me where the default installation folder is located within whonix?

Thanks,
sandeep
